    • Method Detail

      • computeImage

        public static org.opencv.core.Mat computeImage​(int stage,
                                               org.opencv.core.Mat mat,
                                               Window win,
                                               int medianFilterKSize,
                                               double alphaSrc,
                                               double alphaMask,
                                               double intensityThreshold,
                                               double contourThreshold,
                                               double minimumSurface,
                                               int thresholdVesselContour,
                                               int kernelVesselContour,
                                               int resizeWidth,
                                               int angle)
        Main method of the glass processing algorithm. Depending on value of stage, can return various Mat objects that correspond to certain stages of the processing.
        Parameters:
        stage - two values possible : Window.CROPPING_STAGE for when we want to stop the processing after the cropping stage Window.MASKING_STAGE for stopping after extracting the mask contours Every other value will result in the full processing of the image.
        mat - The original Mat object. Typically, it's a RGB image that contains a glass with water in it.
        win - Window object (controller of the program) that holds the labels info for computing the final evalutation
        medianFilterKSize - Parameter relative to the CROPPING_STAGE (see SpecularReflexion)
        alphaSrc - Parameter relative to the CROPPING_STAGE (see SpecularReflexion)
        alphaMask - Parameter relative to the CROPPING_STAGE (see SpecularReflexion)
        intensityThreshold - Parameter relative to the CROPPING_STAGE (see SpecularReflexion)
        contourThreshold - Parameter relative to the CROPPING_STAGE (see SpecularReflexion)
        minimumSurface - Parameter relative to the MASKING_STAGE (see VesselContour)
        thresholdVesselContour - Parameter relative to the MASKING_STAGE (see VesselContour)
        kernelVesselContour - Parameter relative to the MASKING_STAGE (see VesselContour)
        resizeWidth - Parameter relative to finding the ellipse (see EllipseFinder)
        angle - Parameter relative to finding the ellipse (see EllipseFinder)
        Returns:
        Depending on the value of the stage parameter, the method will return the original Mat with various indicators of the processing's result : a blue rectangle for the area where it's most probable there is a glass, a white outline for the glass contours, and a red ellipse for where the water level is believed to be.
        See Also:
        Window, SpecularReflexion, VesselContour, EllipseFinder
